content.c_answer2: Mamma Mia! opened in 1999 at the Prince Edward Theatre. After 5 successful years it moved across London's West End to the Prince of Wales Theatre. Since 2012, the hit musical has found a home at the Novello Theatre. In total the jukebox musical has been running for 23 years, making it the sixth longest running show in West End history.
content.name: How long has Mamma Mia! been running in London?
content.question: How long has Mamma Mia! been running in London?
